@notice Simplified interface for Gnosis Conditional Tokens
 @dev Based on Gnosis ConditionalTokens contract
@notice Event emitted when a condition is prepared
@notice Event emitted when payouts are reported

@notice Simplified interface for UMA Optimistic Oracle V3
 @dev Based on UMA's OptimisticOracleV3 contract
@notice Event emitted when an assertion is made
@notice Event emitted when an assertion is settled

@title Mock Gnosis Conditional Tokens
 @notice Mock implementation for testing GnosisAdapter
@notice Prepare a condition for a market
@notice Report payouts for a condition (resolve it)
@notice Get payout for a specific position
@notice Check if a condition is resolved

@title Mock UMA Optimistic Oracle
 @notice Mock implementation for testing UMAAdapter
@notice Assert truth about a claim
@notice Get assertion data
@notice Settle an assertion (for testing)
